g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION aty_select_row( i_aty_ID   IN  pdm_activities.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_aty   OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION aty_select_row_uk1( i_aty_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_activities.PCS_ID%TYPE
                           , i_aty_ID_CUST   IN  pdm_activities.ID_CUST%TYPE
                           , o_rt_aty  OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_aty   OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION aty_select_row_upd_uk1( i_aty_PCS_ID   IN  pdm_activities.PCS_ID%TYPE
                               , i_aty_ID_CUST   IN  pdm_activities.ID_CUST%TYPE
                               , o_rt_aty  OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE aty_lock_row( i_aty_ID   IN  pdm_activities.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE aty_lock_row_nowait( i_aty_ID   IN  pdm_activities.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE aty_insert_row ( io_rt_aty  IN OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION aty_update_row( i_aty_ID   IN     pdm_activities.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_aty  IN OUT pdm_activities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION aty_delete_row( i_aty_ID   IN  pdm_activities.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION aty_seq1_nextval
RETURN pdm_activities.ID%TYPE
;


END pdm_aty_tapi_pck;

package body pdm_aty_tapi_pck
is




function aty_select_row( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type
                       , o_rt_aty   out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_aty ( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_activities aty
            where aty.id = i_aty_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_aty( i_aty_id => i_aty_id );
         fetch c_aty into o_rt_aty;
         l_found := c_aty%found;
         close c_aty;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_aty%isopen
         then
            close c_aty;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_select_row;

function aty_select_row_uk1( i_aty_pcs_id   in  pdm_activities.pcs_id%type
                           , i_aty_id_cust   in  pdm_activities.id_cust%type
                           , o_rt_aty  out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_aty ( i_aty_pcs_id   in  pdm_activities.pcs_id%type
                   , i_aty_id_cust   in  pdm_activities.id_cust%type )
      is
         select *
           from pdm_activities aty
          where aty.pcs_id = i_aty_pcs_id 
            and aty.id_cust = i_aty_id_cust ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_aty(i_aty_pcs_id => i_aty_pcs_id, i_aty_id_cust => i_aty_id_cust);
         fetch c_aty into o_rt_aty;
         l_found := c_aty%found;
         close c_aty;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_aty%isopen
      then
         close c_aty;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_select_row_uk1;

function aty_select_row_upd( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type
                           , o_rt_aty   out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_aty ( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_activities aty
            where aty.id = i_aty_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_aty( i_aty_id => i_aty_id );
   fetch c_aty into o_rt_aty;
   l_found := c_aty%found;
   close c_aty;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_aty%isopen
      then
         close c_aty;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end aty_select_row_upd;

function aty_select_row_upd_uk1( i_aty_pcs_id   in  pdm_activities.pcs_id%type
                               , i_aty_id_cust   in  pdm_activities.id_cust%type
                               , o_rt_aty  out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := aty_select_row_uk1( i_aty_pcs_id   =>  i_aty_pcs_id
                                   , i_aty_id_cust   =>  i_aty_id_cust
                                   , o_rt_aty => o_rt_aty );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := aty_select_row_upd( i_aty_id => o_rt_aty.id
                                      , o_rt_aty => o_rt_aty );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end aty_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure aty_lock_row( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_aty ( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_activities aty
              where aty.id = i_aty_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_aty_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                aty_lock_row_nowait( i_aty_id => i_aty_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_aty( i_aty_id => i_aty_id );
                  close c_aty;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_aty%isopen
         then
            close c_aty;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_lock_row;

procedure aty_lock_row_nowait( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_aty ( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_activities aty
               where aty.id = i_aty_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_aty_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_aty( i_aty_id => i_aty_id );

            close c_aty;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_aty%isopen
        then
           close c_aty;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_aty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end aty_lock_row_nowait;

function aty_perform_update( i_aty_id   in     pdm_activities.id%type
                           , io_rt_aty  in out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return number
;

function aty_perform_delete( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure aty_insert_row ( io_rt_aty  in out pdm_activities%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into pdm_activities( id
                                , pcs_id
                                , id_cust )
              values ( io_rt_aty.id
                     , io_rt_aty.pcs_id
                     , io_rt_aty.id_cust )
           returning id
                   , pcs_id
                   , id_cust
                into io_rt_aty.id
                   , io_rt_aty.pcs_id
                   , io_rt_aty.id_cust;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_aty.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_aty.pcs_id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_aty.id_cust||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_insert_row;

function aty_perform_update( i_aty_id   in     pdm_activities.id%type
                           , io_rt_aty  in out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update pdm_activities
            set id = io_rt_aty.id
              , pcs_id = io_rt_aty.pcs_id
              , id_cust = io_rt_aty.id_cust
          where id = i_aty_id
      returning id
              , pcs_id
              , id_cust
           into io_rt_aty.id
              , io_rt_aty.pcs_id
              , io_rt_aty.id_cust;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_aty.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_aty.pcs_id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_aty.id_cust||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_perform_update;

function aty_perform_delete( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from pdm_activities
          where id = i_aty_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_aty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end aty_perform_delete;

function aty_update_row( i_aty_id   in     pdm_activities.id%type
                       , io_rt_aty  in out pdm_activities%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         aty_lock_row( i_aty_id   =>  i_aty_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            aty_perform_update( i_aty_id   =>  i_aty_id
                              , io_rt_aty  => io_rt_aty );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_aty.id||'"'
                                                          ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_aty.pcs_id||'"'
                                                          ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_aty.id_cust||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end aty_update_row;

function aty_delete_row( i_aty_id   in  pdm_activities.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         aty_lock_row( i_aty_id   =>  i_aty_id );

         
         l_deleted := aty_perform_delete( i_aty_id   =>  i_aty_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_aty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end aty_delete_row;

function aty_seq1_nextval
return pdm_activities.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.aty_seq1_nextval';
   l_aty_id  pdm_activities.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select pdm_aty_seq1.nextval 
           into l_aty_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_aty_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end aty_seq1_nextval;


end pdm_aty_tapi_pck;
/
